definitions.definition: the activity of being involved in a battle against an enemy
definitions.sensetop: fighting with somebody/somethingfighting between A and B

examples.text: Fighting broke out in three districts of the city last night.
The island was the scene of **heavy fighting** during World War II.
At least 50 were killed in **fierce fighting** with local militia.
The fighting between the rebels and government troops continues.

definitions.definition: an argument or arguments with somebody about something

examples.text: He hated all the fighting at home.

definitions.definition: the activity of trying very hard to get something or achieve something

examples.text: years of fighting against the policy

definitions.definition: the activity of taking part in a boxing match
a small chance of being successful if a great effort is made

examples.text: We still have a fighting chance of beating them and winning the Cup.
If you win this round then you still have a fighting chance.

definitions.definition: a feeling that you are ready to fight very hard for something or to try something difficult
comments or remarks that show that you are ready to fight very hard for something

examples.text: What we want from the management is fighting talk.
